Package ru.alvisid.pacs.repository.datajpa

Interface CrudDayOffRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:

public interface CrudDayOffRepository

    • Method Detail

      • save

        @Transactional
DayOff save​(DayOff dayOff)
        Saves or updates a given day off. If there are a given object in the data base then the given object will be update. If there aren't a given object in the data base then a new object with new id (data base set default value) will be saved.
        Specified by:
        save in interface org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<DayOff,​java.lang.Integer>
        Parameters:
        dayOff - a day off to save.
        Returns:
        the saved day off.

      • delete

        @Transactional
@Modifying
@Query("DELETE FROM DayOff do WHERE do.id=:id")
int delete​(@Param("id")
           int id)
        Deletes a day off by given id.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the day off that must be deleted.
        Returns:
        amount of the deleted entities.
